entities

Class Spectators

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • entities.Spectators
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntity, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Spectators
extends java.lang.Thread
implements IEntity
    This file contains the code that represents the Spectator lifecycle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spectators

        public Spectators(IControlCentre cc,
                  IBettingCentre bc,
                  IPaddock paddock,
                  int moneyToBet,
                  int id)
        Spectators Constructor
        Parameters:
        cc - The Control Centre is a shared memory region where the Spectator will perform actions.
        bc - The Betting Centre is a shared memory region where the Spectator will perform actions.
        paddock - The Paddock is a shared memory region where the Spectator will perform actions.
        moneyToBet - The money the spectator has to bet.
        id - The ID of the spectator.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The run method of the Spectator executes its entire life cycle, making the transitions between the states: Waiting for a race to start - Appraising the horses - Placing a bet - Watching a race - Collecting the gains - Celebrating. This method runs until it's time to relax a bit - death state.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
